verses.verse: And David <S%H6213>made<s%> him <S%H1004>houses<s%> in the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H3559>prepared<s%> a <S%H4725>place<s%> for the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> for it a <S%H168>tent.<s%>

Then <S%H227><s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3808>None<s%> ought to <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> them hath the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H977>chosen<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and to <S%H8334>minister<s%> unto him <S%H5704>forever.<s%> <S%H5769><s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> together <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H4725>place,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for it.
And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H622>assembled<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and the Levites: <S%H3881><s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath;<s%> <S%H222>Uriel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and twenty: <S%H6242><s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari;<s%> <S%H6222>Asaiah<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> two <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and twenty: <S%H6242><s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershom;<s%> <S%H3100>Joel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and thirty: <S%H7970><s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H469>Elizaphan;<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> two hundred: <S%H3967><s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> <S%H447>Eliel<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> fourscore: <S%H8084><s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel;<s%> <S%H5992>Amminadab<s%> the <S%H8269>chief,<s%> and his <S%H251>brethren<s%> a <S%H3967>hundred<s%> and <S%H8147>twelve.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> for <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and for the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> for <S%H222>Uriel,<s%> <S%H6222>Asaiah,<s%> and <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> <S%H8098>Shemaiah,<s%> and <S%H447>Eliel,<s%> and <S%H5992>Amminadab,<s%>

And <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H859>Ye<s%> are the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> sanctify <S%H6942>yourselves,<s%> both <S%H859>ye<s%> and your <S%H251>brethren,<s%> that ye may bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the place that I have <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for it.

For <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H859>ye<s%> did it <S%H3808>not<s%> at the <S%H4480>first,<s%> <S%H7223><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> our <S%H430>God<s%> made a <S%H6555>breach<s%> upon us, <S%H3588>for<s%> that we <S%H1875>sought<s%> him <S%H3808>not<s%> after the due <S%H4941>order.<s%>

So the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> sanctified <S%H6942>themselves<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> upon their <S%H3802>shoulders<s%> with the <S%H4133>staves<s%> <S%H5921>thereon,<s%> <S%H834>as<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to the <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> to <S%H5975>appoint<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H251>brethren<s%> to be the <S%H7891>singers<s%> with <S%H3627>instruments<s%> of <S%H7892>music,<s%> <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> and <S%H3658>harps<s%> and <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> <S%H8085>sounding,<s%> by lifting <S%H7311>up<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> with <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

So the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H5975>appointed<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H1968>Heman<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3100>Joel;<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1296>Berechiah;<s%> and <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari<s%> their <S%H251>brethren,<s%> <S%H387>Ethan<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H6984>Kushaiah;<s%>

And <S%H5973>with<s%> them their <S%H251>brethren<s%> of the <S%H4932>second<s%> degree, <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> <S%H1122>Ben,<s%> and <S%H3268>Jaaziel,<s%> and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H6042>Unni,<s%> <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> and <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> and <S%H466>Elipheleh,<s%> and <S%H4737>Mikneiah,<s%> and <S%H5654>Obed-edom,<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> the <S%H7778>porters.<s%>
So the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> and <S%H387>Ethan,<s%> were appointed to <S%H8085>sound<s%> with <S%H4700>cymbals<s%> of <S%H5178>brass;<s%>

And <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H5815>Aziel,<s%> and <S%H8070>Shemiramoth,<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H6042>Unni,<s%> and <S%H446>Eliab,<s%> and <S%H4641>Maaseiah,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> <S%H5961>Alamoth;<s%>

And <S%H4993>Mattithiah,<s%> and <S%H466>Elipheleh,<s%> and <S%H4737>Mikneiah,<s%> and <S%H5654>Obed-edom,<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel,<s%> and <S%H5812>Azaziah,<s%> with <S%H3658>harps<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> the <S%H8067>Sheminith<s%> to <S%H5329>excel.<s%>

And <S%H3663>Chenaniah,<s%> <S%H8269>chief<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> was for <S%H4853>song:<s%> he <S%H3256>instructed<s%> about the <S%H4853>song,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was <S%H995>skillful.<s%>
And <S%H1296>Berechiah<s%> and <S%H511>Elkanah<s%> were <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%> for the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

And <S%H7645>Shebaniah,<s%> and <S%H3046>Jehoshaphat,<s%> and <S%H5417>Nethaneel,<s%> and <S%H6022>Amasai,<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah,<s%> and <S%H1141>Benaiah,<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer,<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> did <S%H2690>blow<s%> with the <S%H2689>trumpets<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of <S%H430>God:<s%> and <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> and <S%H3174>Jehiah<s%> were <S%H7778>doorkeepers<s%> for the <S%H727>ark.<s%>

So <S%H1961><s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H8269>captains<s%> over <S%H505>thousands,<s%> <S%H1980>went<s%> to bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5654>Obed-edom<s%> with <S%H8057>joy.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5826>helped<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> that they <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H6499>bullocks<s%> and <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H352>rams.<s%>

And <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H3736>clothed<s%> with a <S%H4598>robe<s%> of fine <S%H948>linen,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> that <S%H5375>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark,<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> and <S%H3663>Chenaniah<s%> the <S%H8269>master<s%> of the <S%H4853>song<s%> with the <S%H7891>singers:<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> also had upon him an <S%H646>ephod<s%> of <S%H906>linen.<s%>

Thus <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with <S%H8643>shouting,<s%> and with <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H7782>cornet,<s%> and with <S%H2689>trumpets,<s%> and with <S%H4700>cymbals,<s%> making a <S%H8085>noise<s%> with <S%H5035>psalteries<s%> and <S%H3658>harps.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5704>to<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> that <S%H4324>Michal<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H7586>Saul<s%> looking <S%H8259>out<s%> <S%H1157>at<s%> a <S%H2474>window<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H7540>dancing<s%> and <S%H7832>playing:<s%> and she <S%H959>despised<s%> him in her <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
